xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="-Uf3QeK)sNj(8ZO;x6j4" x="258" y="158">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="controls_loop_forever" id="3Rd}*-}PVWtJBob-)fb*">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="bit_button_event" id="E@{o)96FqP[,}wKjQY3T">
            <field name="var_">_bit_btnA_</field>
            <field name="event_">pressed</field>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id="iD=ltpzL~q=)(fYn,ejc">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="b]7!u@U{.onvujL-!8~O">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="@o=z4LXSB*aKaGiSfQN5">
                    <field name="TEXT">John</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="radio_channel_get" id="o8~P}GrjgHrtox_OCa)r">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="ylwAqkK,SJLFj;Y]=j0~">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="K{_0@0hurz)OAs)Iqt/G">
                    <field name="type_">1</field>
                    <field name="speed_">2</field>
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                    <value name="str_">
                      <block type="radio_channel_value" id=";!/[fexdskt|U1.pXW`["></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="color_">
                      <block type="colour_picker" id=",n9Iclb+MI|6luxocpzl">
                        <field name="COLOUR">#ff0000</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <next>
                      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="A3?[K4Q-5)F/a9,}cB{Q">
                        <field name="music_">m1</field>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="bit_button_event" id="tvGL;,1)h2q[WOur?.6o">
                    <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
                    <field name="event_">pressed</field>
                    <statement name="do_">
                      <block type="bit_matrix_off" id="dO~)BEWYARih83Aw{S38"></block>
                    </statement>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
